channel.title: Project Fantasy
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/374/97589591.png[/img]
[code=java] Coder: RandQm + I hope that Rodrigo wants to help me again <3 (imsuperman05)
Base: Delta [/code]
[size=13pt][b]Introduction:[/b][/size] Like some might now I had this project Fantasy World a while ago, which I paused. Since kids these days don't like the good old oldschool servers + I was finding more and more problems in the source. I decided to change the client to a Pi-like 474 also I took a new source. I love the new source and I'm getting the coding spirit back. So I'm back on track :D
[size=13pt][b]Goals:[/b][/size] Green = Done Orange = In progress Red = Not started note: Yes I ripped this lay out including pics hehe.[/center]
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042726/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img] [b]Combat[/b]
- Combat is good enough, no need to work on it.
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043125/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img] [b]Magic[/b]
- Working ancient spells - Autocasting
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043145/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img] [b]Ranging[/b]
-Almost flawless Ranging
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091215022527/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img] [b]Prayer[/b]
- All bones (I consider 15 kinds of bones as finished) - Handled in a class
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205044857/runescape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
- All rocks - Correct pickaxe look - Prospecting - Handled in a class
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205044858/runescape/images/d/df/Smithing-icon.png[/img][b] Smithing[/b]
- Will be the last I will do, will see what ima do
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img][b] Fishing[/b]
- All fish (21 kinds) - Right animations
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043728/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img] [b]Cooking[/b]
- All fish cookable (21 kinds) - Burning & Gauntlets - Handled in a class
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img] [b]Woodcutting[/b]
- All trees working - Right axe look - Tree stumps & respawning
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img] [b]Firemaking[/b]
- Simple firemaking at spot, since players don't like getting clipped everywhere and have to run back to the bank from miles away.
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101104013322/runescape/images/8/84/Agility-icon.png[/img] [b]Agility[/b]
- Gnome course - Yelling gnomes - Tickets & exchange
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101017212730/runescape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img] [b]Herblore[/b]
- 20 kinds of potions with right first and second ingredients | - Handled in a class - Identifying herbs | - Handled in a class
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png[/img] [b]thieving[/b]
- Npc thieving with stunning - All stalls with right items - Chests - Handled in a class
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053743/runescape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img] [b]Crafting[/b]
- Hide tanning & crafting - All uncuts - Handled in a class
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053740/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img] [b]Runecrafting[/b]
- All altars - Multiple rcing - Working pouches
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img] [b]Fletching[/b]
- Interfaces - Attaching strings - Arrow making
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103032422/runescape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img] [b]Slayer[/b]
- Old floor to floor system
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img] [b]Farming[/b]
- 41 Seeds working - Right patches for the right seeds
[img]http://t3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR9y0hvH7z76zUvuH9352DqYH6TJOyGyFwdi--3e_6d5zE2f-DdHZK7tQ[/img] [b]Quests[/b]
- 20 Quests - Implanting and rewriting for the new source - Beginners Tutorial
[img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/4259/frtp.png[/img] [b]Hidden[/b] - A total and unique skill, which I will not give information about yet, till it's finished
[size=13pt][b]More:[/b][/size] - Correct rs shops + content + prizes - Use of many areas - Good economy - Skillcapes with reqs - Skillcape emotes - Member Island - Packaging
[size=13pt][b]Media:[/b][/size] [img]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/1631/clean.png[/img] [img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/4274/53443536j.png[/img] [img]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/3622/17661280.png[/img] *Coming more soon*
Added 30 diff food which are all eatable, Almost finished beginner tutorial ; [img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/3677/13acx.png[/img] [img]http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/8282/98585602.png[/img] [img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/4011/67618712.png[/img] [img]http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/9882/69a.png[/img]
[size=13pt][b]Credits:[/b][/size] [b]- me[/b] [b]- delta[/b] [b]- Rodrigo (imsuperman05) [/b]

But besides that this does look like it has potential, good luck with it.

item.title: Project Fantasy
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[center]

Coder: RandQm
+ I hope that Rodrigo wants to help me again <3
(imsuperman05)

Base: Delta

[size=13pt]Introduction:[/size]
Like some might now I had this project Fantasy World a while ago, which I paused.
Since kids these days don’t like the good old oldschool servers + I was finding more and more problems in the source.
I decided to change the client to a Pi-like 474 also I took a new source.
I love the new source and I’m getting the coding spirit back.
So I’m back on track

[size=13pt]Goals:[/size]
Green = Done
Orange = In progress
Red = Not started
note: Yes I ripped this lay out including pics hehe.[/center]

Combat

  • Combat is good enough, no need to work on it.

Magic

  • Working ancient spells
  • Autocasting

Ranging

-Almost flawless Ranging

Prayer

  • All bones (I consider 15 kinds of bones as finished)
  • Handled in a class

Mining

  • All rocks
  • Correct pickaxe look
  • Prospecting
  • Handled in a class

Smithing

  • Will be the last I will do, will see what ima do

Fishing

  • All fish (21 kinds)
  • Right animations

Cooking

  • All fish cookable (21 kinds)
  • Burning & Gauntlets
  • Handled in a class

Woodcutting

  • All trees working
  • Right axe look
  • Tree stumps & respawning

Firemaking

  • Simple firemaking at spot, since players don’t like getting clipped everywhere and have to run back to the bank from miles away.

Agility

  • Gnome course
  • Yelling gnomes
  • Tickets & exchange

Herblore

  • 20 kinds of potions with right first and second ingredients | - Handled in a class
  • Identifying herbs | - Handled in a class

thieving

  • Npc thieving with stunning
  • All stalls with right items
  • Chests
  • Handled in a class

Crafting

  • Hide tanning & crafting
  • All uncuts
  • Handled in a class

Runecrafting

  • All altars
  • Multiple rcing
  • Working pouches

Fletching

  • Interfaces
  • Attaching strings
  • Arrow making

Slayer

  • Old floor to floor system

Farming

  • 41 Seeds working
  • Right patches for the right seeds

Quests

  • 20 Quests
  • Implanting and rewriting for the new source
  • Beginners Tutorial

Hidden

  • A total and unique skill, which I will not give information about yet, till it’s finished

[size=13pt]More:[/size]

  • Correct rs shops + content + prizes
  • Use of many areas
  • Good economy
  • Skillcapes with reqs
  • Skillcape emotes
  • Member Island
  • Packaging

[size=13pt]Media:[/size]



Coming more soon

Added 30 diff food which are all eatable,
Almost finished beginner tutorial
;



[size=13pt]Credits:[/size]
- me
- delta
- Rodrigo (imsuperman05)
